title: Text Generation Inference (DataCenter)
description: Deploy a Hugging Face-compatible Text Generation Inference (TGI) container using SaladCloud Secure nodes with multi-GPU support.

container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Must be 2â€“63 characters long using lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start/end with a hyphen.

container_image_model.title: Model
container_image_model.description: The Hugging Face model ID or custom image that supports TGI. This determines which model will be loaded and served.

num_of_shards.title: Number of Shards
num_of_shards.description: The number of shards to split the model across. Should match the number of GPUs you want to use. Required for multi-GPU inference.

cuda_visible_devices.title: CUDA Visible Devices
cuda_visible_devices.description: Comma-separated list of GPU device IDs to expose to the container. Controls which GPUs the TGI container can use (e.g. '0,1,2').

hf_token.title: Hugging Face Token
hf_token.description: Optional. Required only if using a private or gated Hugging Face model. You can create a token at huggingface.co/settings/tokens.

networking_auth.title: Require Container Gateway Authentication
networking_auth.description: When enabled, requests must include a SaladCloud API Key to access the container. When disabled, public (unauthenticated) access is allowed.
